SKT_FIRST.name: Fire and Reposition
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks the enemy.\nWhen scoring a critical hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.
description: Attacks the enemy.\nWhen scoring a critical hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000060_1_1]</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n치명 공격 시 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 가장 공격력이 높은 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>협공</color>을 발생시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルで会心が発生した場合、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で、攻撃力が最も高い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>連携</color>を発生させる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Smoke Screen
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to grant all allies increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, before attacking an enemy.\nWhen scoring a critical hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Silenced</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: +3 turns increased Critical Damage on allies
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 会心ダメージUP+3ターン\n(味方全体)

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 効果命中UP+3ターン\n(味方全体)

description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000060_2_1]</color> chance to grant all allies increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000060_2_1] turn(s)</color>, before attacking an enemy.\nWhen scoring a critical hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000060_2_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Silenced</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000060_2_2] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 증가시킨 후 적을 공격합니다.\n치명 공격 시 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>침묵</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: <color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせた後、敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルで会心が発生した場合、<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で、対象に<color=#28d9ed>沈黙</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Maximum Range Fire
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nWhen scoring a critical hit on one or more enemies, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase the <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of all targets by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000060_3_2]</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000060_3_2] turn(s)</color>.\nWhen scoring a critical hit on one or more enemies, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000060_3_1]</color> chance to increase the <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of all targets by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상 모두의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 감소시킵니다.\n한 명 이상의 적에게 치명 공격 시 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상 모두의 <color=#28d9ed>스킬 쿨타임</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で、敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\nこのスキルで会心が発生した場合、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で、敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>スキルターン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>増加させる。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000060_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000060_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상 한 명에게 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>표식</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、対象単体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>標的</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color> の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほど連携攻撃で与えるダメージがUPする。
